## Sentence Delimiters

## POS Categories

verb | Verb
noun | Noun
adj | Adjective
adv | Adverb
prep | Preposition
conj | Conjunction
pron | Pronoun
art | Article
other | Other

---

## Morphological Categories

### verb
tense: inf, pres, past, ptcp, subj
person: 1sg, 2sg, 3sg, 1pl, 2pl, 3pl

### noun
case: nom, acc, dat, gen
number: sg, pl

### adj
degree: pos, comp, sup
case: nom, acc, dat, gen
gender: m, f, n
number: sg, pl

### adv
form: base

### prep
form: base

### conj
form: base

### pron
case: nom, acc, dat, gen

### art
case: nom, acc, dat, gen
gender: m, f, n
number: sg, pl

### other
form: base
